metadata.title: USN-4365-1 -- Bind vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Lior Shafir, Yehuda Afek, and Anat Bremler-Barr discovered that Bind incorrectly limited certain fetches. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to consume resources, leading to a denial of service, or possibly use Bind to perform a reflection attack. (CVE-2020-8616)  Tobias Klein discovered that Bind incorrectly handled checking TSIG validity. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Bind to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly perform other attacks. (CVE-2020-8617)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4365-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libdns-export1100 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libdns-export1100-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libdns1100 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisc169 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libbind-dev - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisc-export169-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisccc-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisccfg-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 bind9-host - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libirs-export160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisccc160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisc-export169 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisccfg160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 bind9-doc - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libbind-export-dev - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisccc-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libirs-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libisccfg-export160-udeb - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 dnsutils - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 bind9 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 bind9utils - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libbind9-160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 libirs160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 liblwres160 - 1:9.11.3+dfsg-1ubuntu1.12 No subscription required
